Welcome to Tabular Ensemble’s documentation!#

Tabular Ensemble is a benchmark platform for tabular prediction tasks.

Feel free to create an issue and raise questions if the documentation or the API reference is not clear or if you find grammar faults and typos.

  • Get Started
    • Installation
    • Quick start
    • Basics of running benchmarks

    • Cross-validation

    • Customized model base

    • Build your own model upon others
    • New data splitters
    • New data derivers
    • New data imputers
    • New data processors
    • Multimodal data: Image classification as an example
